fastemplate.services.security.lazy_decode_token(token: str)[source]¶

Retrieves a username from a given token. This is not a good way to handle token validation.

Parameters

token (str) – token string

Returns

username

Return type

str

fastemplate.services.security.lazy_generate_token(username: str)[source]¶

Returns

dict

Returns

hashed str

Return type

str
